code: import axios from'axios';var API_key=process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY;function getCurrentWeather(location,selectValue){var cod;return axios.get("http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=".concat(location,"&units=").concat(selectValue,"&appid=").concat(API_key)).catch(function(error){if(error.response){console.log('Erro: ',error.response.data);cod=error.response.data.cod;return cod;}});}function getForecast(lat,lon,selectValue){var cod;return axios.get("http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/onecall?lat=".concat(lat,"&lon=").concat(lon,"&units=").concat(selectValue,"&appid=").concat(API_key)).catch(function(error){if(error.response){console.log('Erro: ',error.response.data);cod=error.response.data.cod;return cod;}});}export{getCurrentWeather,getForecast};
